summary: Permanently delete stuff!  Remove all that save clutter now!!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/vegasfirebird/Nexus/TrashCansofSkyrim_Paint_zpsbe081894.jpg?t=1357568738[/img]

This mod includes mod \"Bags of Trash\" and will not work without it.  Just make sure you load TCS_Cities after Bagsoftrash ;) before starting your game.

**02/03/2013 UPDATE!! (I believe I\'ve got a working file now)
Try downloading the latest file (TCS-Cities) and please report any issues.  All feedback is welcomed.  The crooked BLUE PALACE has been fixed.  Just download and replace the other file ;)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod enables the player to permanently delete items from their inventory.  Is great for tossing away looted items or acquired junk.  40 Locations so far!  And it just got even better, now there\'s a painted can version so you can easily point them out.  Special thanks to TheGreenLion here on Nexus for his creation of the painted barrel :)

Locations:
DragonBridge - 2
Dawnstar - 3
Falkreath - 3
Helgen - 3
Ivarstead - 3
Karthwasten - 2
Markarth - 2
Morthal - 3
Riften - 4
Rorikstead - 1
Riverwood - 3
Solitude - 3
Shor\'s Stone - 1
Whiterun - 3
Windhelm - 3
Winterhold - 3
**************************************************************************************************************************************
Future Plans: Incorporate a script and attach it to the trash cans so that it pays the player based on weight of the objects.  Make a mesh for the trash cans so they look like they have trash in them.  +Add more locations. And create a stand-alone version for player homes.

*Credits*
TheGreenLion (Paint Guy)
zBobGuy (Script Guy)
For his mod:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9513
asdgora (Trash Guy)
And special thanks to IsharaMeradin @Nexus Forums for script advice
author: SkyiManiak
